text: Essential oils are complex mixtures isolated from aromatic plants which may possess antioxidant and anti - inflammatory activities of interest in thye food and cosmetic industries as well as in the human health field . In this work , a review was done on the most recent publications concerning their antioxidant and anti - inflammatory activities . At the same time a survey of the methods generally used for the evaluation of antioxidant activity and some of the mechanisms involved in the anti - inflammatory activities of essential oils are also reported .
